titles.title: Fill My Cup Lord (hymn of the Church)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Fill my cup Lord I lift it up Lord Come and quench this thirsting of my soul Bread of heaven feed me till I want no more Fill my cup fill it up and make me whole{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Like the woman at the well I was seeking For things that could not satisfy And then I heard my Savior speaking Draw from my well that never shall run dry{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There are millions in this world who are craving The pleasures earthly things afford But none can match the wondrous treasure That I find in Jesus Christ my Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So my brother if the things this world gave you Leave hungers that won't pass away My blessed Lord will come and save you If you kneel to Him and humbly pray{/lang-eng}
